author: Griff Rhys Jones
method: Preheat the grill to medium. Place the rocket and tomatoes into a bowl. Remove any skin and bones from the eel and place under the grill to gently warm through. For the dressing, place all of the dressing ingredients together in a bowl and mix well. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad and mix to coat the leaves, then place the eel fillets over the top.
ingredients: 2 handfuls rocket,  15-20 cherry tomatoes, halved,  150g/5oz smoked eel, cut into 6cm/2Â½in pieces (available from some supermarkets and delicatessens),  1 tbsp tarragon vinegar (or white wine vinegar if unavailable) ,  2 tsp Dijon mustard ,  2 tbsp olive oil ,  3 tbsp vegetable oil ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
